snippet: High school students will take the college-admissions exam by computer starting in the spring of 2015, but at least for a while, the paper and pencil version will still be available.
abstract: High school students will take ACT college admissions exam by computer starting spring of 2015; paper and pencil version will remain available for the foreseeable future.
lead_paragraph: High school students will take the college-admissions exam by computer starting in the spring of 2015, but at least for a while, the paper and pencil version will still be available.

headline.seo: ACT to Move Toward Computer-Based Testing
headline.main: ACT to Move Toward Computer-Based Testing
